alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Dale and northeastern Coffee Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Enterprise, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Mixons Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field, Knox Field, Lucile, Gerald, Turner Crossroads and Central City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
